entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
